name: listLen
description: Determines the number of elements in a list.

params.name: list
params.description: A list or a variable that contains one

params.name: delimiters
params.description: A string or a variable that contains one. Characters that separate list elements. The default value is comma. If this parameter contains more than one character, ColdFusion processes each occurrence of each character as a delimiter.

params.name: includeEmptyValues
params.description: CF10+ If includeEmptyValues is set to true, all empty values in the list will be considered when computing length. If set to false, the empty list elements are ignored.

examples.title: Simple listLen Example
examples.description: Get the number of elements in this list

examples.title: listLen Example with Delimiter
examples.description: Get the number of elements in this list using a custom delimiter

examples.title: listLen Example with IncludeEmptyValues
examples.description: Get the number of elements in this list, including empty values
